mapper.sql: id, continent_name, sorting, remark, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from t_region_continent where status = 0 order by sorting

select
from t_region_continent order by id desc

select
from t_region_continent where 1 = 1
and continent_name like '%${continentName}%'
and status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by id desc
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

sorting,

mapper.update:
update t_region_continent
continent_name = #{continentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sorting = #{sorting,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_region_continent set continent_name = #{continentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sorting = #{sorting,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
